introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is にっき, which you will often hear in casual conversations when talking about writing down your daily events or experiences.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "nikki" means "a diary," "journal," or "log." It's something where you note down experiences, thoughts, or events happening in your daily life.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "nikki" are "shuki" and "memo." "Shuki" means "a personal account," often more formal or reflective. "Memo" means "a note," usually for brief thoughts or reminders.
antonyms: 忘却 : ぼうきゃく : lapse of memory
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word "nikki" are "kioku" and "boukaku." "Kioku" means "memory," referring to what we remember without writing it down. "Boukaku" means "forgetting," which is the act of not remembering things.

collocations.kanji: にっきにすでにのせる
collocations.furigana: にっきにすでにのせる

example_sentences.furigana: 毎日(まいにち)、日記(にっき)を書(か)きます。

translations.EN: I write a diary every day.
translations.ID: Saya menulis buku harian setiap hari.
translations.ES: Escribo un diario todos los días.
translations.VI: Tôi viết nhật ký mỗi ngày.
translations.FR: J'écris un journal tous les jours.
translations.MY: ကိုယ့်နေ့လည်စာရေးတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं हर दिन डायरी लिखता हूं।
translations.FA: من هر روز دفتر خاطرات می نویسم.

example_sentences.kanji: 昨日の日記にすでにのせた。
example_sentences.furigana: 昨日(きのう)の日記(にっき)にすでにのせた。

translations.EN: I already wrote it in yesterday's diary.
translations.ID: Saya sudah menuliskannya di buku harian kemarin.
translations.ES: Ya lo anoté en el diario de ayer.
translations.VI: Tôi đã viết nó vào nhật ký hôm qua rồi.
translations.FR: Je l'ai déjà écrit dans le journal d'hier.
translations.NE: मैले यसलाई हिजोको डायरीमा पहिल्यै लेखेको थिएँ।
translations.BN: আমি ইতিমধ্যেই এটি গতকালের ডায়েরিতে লিখেছি।
translations.ZH: 我已经写在昨天的日记里了。
translations.TL: Nailagay ko na ito sa diary kahapon.
translations.MY: မနေ့က ဒိုင်ယာရီထဲမှာ ရေးပြီးသားပါ။
translations.HI: मैंने इसे कल की डायरी में पहले ही लिख दिया था।
translations.AR: لقد كتبته بالفعل في يوميات الأمس.
translations.FA: من آن را در دفترچه یادداشت دیروز نوشتم.

example_sentences.kanji: 毎日、日記をとることにしています。
example_sentences.furigana: 毎日(まいにち)、日記(にっき)をとることにしています。

translations.EN: I have made it a habit to keep a diary every day.
translations.ID: Saya telah membuat kebiasaan untuk membuat catatan harian setiap hari.
translations.ES: He tomado la costumbre de llevar un diario cada día.
translations.VI: Tôi đã tạo thói quen giữ nhật ký hàng ngày.
translations.FR: Je prends l'habitude de tenir un journal chaque jour.
translations.NE: मैले हरेक दिन डायरी राख्ने बानी बनाएको छु।
translations.BN: আমি প্রতিদিন একটি ডায়েরি রাখার অভ্যাস করেছি।
translations.ZH: 我每天都有写日记的习惯。
translations.TL: Ginawa kong ugali ang magsulat ng diary araw-araw.
translations.MY: နေ့တိုင်း မှတ်စုယူပါရေဲ့ဝမ်းကြင်မှာ။
translations.HI: मैंने हर दिन डायरी रखने की आदत बनाई है।
translations.AR: لقد جعلت من العادة أن أكتب يوميات كل يوم.
translations.FA: هر روز تصمیم دارم یادداشت روزانه بنویسم.

example_sentences.furigana: ひみつ日記(にっき)を読(よ)んだ。

translations.VI: Tôi đã đọc nhật ký bí mật.
translations.TL: Binasa ko ang lihim na talaarawan.
translations.MY: မြှုပ်ကွက်မှတ်စုအုပ်ကို ဖတ်ခဲ့သည်။
translations.FA: من دفتر خاطرات محرمانه را خواندم.

example_sentences.kanji: こどもの日記はかわいいです。
example_sentences.furigana: こどもの日記(にっき)はかわいい(かわいい)です。

translations.ES: El diario del niño es lindo.
translations.VI: Nhật ký của trẻ dễ thương.
translations.FR: Le journal de l'enfant est mignon.
translations.TL: Ang talaarawan ng bata ay maganda.
translations.MY: ကလေးရဲ့ ဒိုင်ယာရီသည် ချစ်ဖို့ကောင်းသည်။
